title: The Fractured Timeline
description: Reality itself has shattered. The Mojave exists simultaneously with the Commonwealth, Capital Wasteland, and Appalachia. All eras of the wasteland coexist in impossible harmony. You must discover why - and whether to preserve or destroy this fractured world.

lore.summary: A mysterious convergence has merged all Fallout timelines into a single reality. Pre-war experiments, the Institute's teleportation tech, and FizzCo's quantum resonance devices have created a temporal nexus centered in the Mojave. Players can now experience quests from 2161 (FO1), 2241 (FO2), 2277 (FO3), 2281 (FO:NV), 2287 (FO4), and 2102-2103 (FO76) all at once.
lore.canonWarning: This is an alternate reality fan experience. Timeline inconsistencies are intentional and part of the game's unique design.
lore.fracturedRealityExplanation: In this world, the Master's army marches while the Institute hunts synths. Caesar's Legion raids while the Enclave rebuilds. Brotherhood chapters from all eras coexist. Time is broken, and that's the point.

stages.name: Reality Fractures
stages.description: Strange occurrences across the wasteland: NCR soldiers report seeing Brotherhood airships that shouldn't exist, Institute synths appearing in pre-war ruins, and radio signals from multiple time periods broadcasting simultaneously.

objectives.text: Talk to Harlan Voss about the timeline convergence
objectives.hint: Harlan might know something about FizzCo experiments

stages.name: When All Times Collide
stages.description: Meet representatives from every major faction across all timelines. They're all confused, scared, and trying to understand why their enemies from different eras suddenly exist.

objectives.text: Attend the Fractured Timeline Summit at Hoover Dam
Decide your approach to the fractured timeline
choices: Embrace chaos - let all timelines coexist
Exploit the fracture for personal gain
Investigate who or what caused this

stages.name: The Triangle's Secret
stages.description: Your investigation leads to Jax Voss and 'the triangle' - the anomaly system that connects your world's lore with the fractured timeline. The Humming One's code fragments might hold answers.

objectives.text: Locate Jax Voss in the temporal triangle
objectives.hint: Jax exists between states - follow the static signals

objectives.text: Decode the Humming One's message about timeline convergence
Discover FizzCo and Vault 77's role in the fracture

lore_reveals: FizzCo's quantum experiments accidentally merged timelines
Vault 77's Overseer AI predicted this convergence
The Humming One is trying to stabilize the fracture
Jax Voss exists as a living anchor point between timelines

stages.name: Reality's Decision
stages.description: You've learned the truth. The fractured timeline was created by a combination of FizzCo experiments, Institute teleportation, and Vault-Tec's secret temporal research. Now you must choose the fate of this impossible world.

choices_explained.preserve: Keep the fractured timeline intact. All eras coexist forever. Players can experience content from FO1, FO2, FO3, FO:NV, FO4, and FO76 simultaneously.
choices_explained.collapse: Collapse the timeline back to a single era. Choose which Fallout timeline becomes 'real'.
choices_explained.stabilize: Use Jax Voss and the Triangle to stabilize the fracture, creating permanent bridges between eras that players can traverse.
choices_explained.amplify: Break reality further. Create NEW timeline branches with content that never existed in any Fallout game.

ending_preserve.name: The Eternal Fracture
ending_preserve.description: You chose to preserve the fractured timeline. Now, wasteland residents from all eras coexist. The Master's super mutants fight alongside FO4 mutants. The Enclave from FO2 debates with FO3's Enclave. Players experience the ultimate Fallout mashup.
ending_preserve.gameplay_impact: All timeline-specific quests remain available forever
ending_preserve.title: Reality Keeper

ending_collapse.name: The Great Reset
ending_collapse.description: You collapsed the timelines back to a single era. Reality returned to normal, but countless people and possibilities were erased. Only one Fallout timeline remains.
ending_collapse.gameplay_impact: Player chooses which game's timeline becomes canon for their playthrough
ending_collapse.title: Timeline Reaper

ending_stabilize.name: The Bridged Realities
ending_stabilize.description: Using Jax Voss and the Triangle, you stabilized the fracture into permanent portals. Players can now travel between stable timeline zones, experiencing different eras in different regions.
ending_stabilize.title: Timeline Architect

ending_amplify.name: Chaos Unbound
ending_amplify.description: You shattered reality even further. Now timelines bleed into each other constantly. Deathclaws from FO1 appear in FO4's Commonwealth. Pre-war America flickers in and out of existence. Total beautiful chaos.
ending_amplify.gameplay_impact: Random timeline events trigger constantly, maximum content chaos
ending_amplify.title: Reality Breaker
ending_amplify.special_reward: Access to 'impossible' quest content that mixes eras in absurd ways

companion_reactions.jax_voss: Relieved - finally someone understands his fractured existence
companion_reactions.harlan_voss: Worried but proud - knew FizzCo experiments would cause this
companion_reactions.jaymie_netterfield: Confused but excited - more timelines means more treasures!
companion_reactions.denton_marris: Panicked - owes money to people from THREE different timelines now
